abstract: Classic Stage Company casts Broadway veteran Kecia Lewis as lead in production of Mother Courage and Her Children, replacing  Tonya Pinkins, who quit over creative conflict with director Brian Kulick.

headline.print_headline: Classic Stage Company Announces New Star for Embattled ‘Mother Courage’
headline.main: Kecia Lewis to Step Into Role of Mother Courage at Classic Stage Company

snippet: Ms. Lewis, a Broadway veteran, is replacing Tonya Pinkins, who quit the production last week because of creative differences with its director, Brian Kulick.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Lewis, a Broadway veteran, is replacing Tonya Pinkins, who quit the production last week because of creative differences with its director, Brian Kulick.
